UPnP_h.help1Txt: The Axis product includes support for UPnP™. This means that when using a workstation running Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7 and with UPnP™ enabled, the product will automatically be detected and added to My Network Places in Windows. Note that, in Windows 7 the product will be found under Start > Computer > Network.
UPnP_h.help1Txt-1: The Axis product includes support for UPnP™. This means that when using a workstation running Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 and with UPnP™ enabled, the product will automatically be detected and added to My Network Places in Windows. Note that, in Windows 7 or Windows 8 the product will be found under Start > Computer > Network.

UPnP_h.help5Txt1: Saving an empty friendly name will return it to the default, which is the product's name and serial number.
UPnP_h.help5Txt2: To install UPnP™ support on Windows XP or Windows Vista; open the Control Panel and select Add/Remove Programs. Then select Add/Remove Windows Components and open the Networking Services section. Click Details and then select UPnP™ as the service to add.
UPnP_h.help5Txt3: To enable UPnP™ support on Windows 7, open the Control Panel and select Network and Sharing Center. Then select Change advanced sharing settings, choose a network profile and select Turn on network discovery.
UPnP_h.help5Txt3-1: To enable UPnP™ support on Windows 7 or Windows 8, open the Control Panel and select Network and Sharing Center. Then select Change advanced sharing settings, choose a network profile and select Turn on network discovery.
